```{r init, include=FALSE}
library("dplyr")
library("readr")
library("infogreffes")
```


```{r, message=FALSE}
table_greffes2014 <- import_infogreffes_from2014(
  year = 2014,
  source_file = "raw-data/chiffres-2014.csv"
  ) %>% 
  arrange(siren, date_cloture, date_depot)
table_greffes2014 %>% glimpse()
```


```{r}
table_greffes2014 %>% 
  group_by(siren, date_cloture) %>% 
  filter(n() > 1) %>% 
  View()
```
